speaker: Lex Fridman
text: The following is a conversation with Joscha Bach, VP of research at the AI Foundation, with a history of research positions at MIT and Harvard. Joscha is one of the most unique and brilliant people in the artificial intelligence community, exploring the workings of the human mind, intelligence, consciousness, life on Earth, and the (possibly simulated) fabric of our universe. I could see myself talking to Joscha many times in the future.
